list_definition.definition: a long formal talk or piece of writing (for a university degree etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Students have to submit a 20,000-word dissertation.

list_ex_of_english: This dissertation analyzes and applies ideas from cakecutting to the design and analysis of negotiation protocols.
Even her doctoral dissertation was not detailed enough to do full justice to it.

Under normal circumstances the presider would be presumed the "author" of the dissertation.
All students in the concentration write a dissertation on a topic central to bioethics.
To get a doctor's degree you had subsequently to write a doctoral dissertation, which had to be a printed book.
Much is already appreciated by those of us who have used the dissertation as a point of reference in subsequent research.
You were at the same time working on your licentiate dissertation, which dealt with aspects of fiscal policy, right?
